function: Fetch dynamic data from backend APIs for rendering frontend components.
static_description: The frontend application displays all content dynamically fetched via RESTful API calls. It uses a responsive layout with cornsilk background and peru-colored UI blocks.

function: Connect to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables to store and retrieve data.
static_description: Backend service configured to connect to PostgreSQL using provided credentials.

function: Allow authenticated users to create, update, and delete their own obituaries.
static_description: Form interface with fields for full name, dates, biography, and profile image URL inside a peru-styled block against a cornsilk background.

interaction_and_states.description: Submit button sends form data to POST /api/obituaries endpoint to create an obituary record.
Edit button loads existing obituary into the form for updates.
Delete button triggers DELETE request to remove the selected obituary.

function: Allow authenticated users to create, update, and delete funeral arrangements.
static_description: Form interface with fields for event type, location, date/time, contact info, and additional details inside a peru-styled block against a cornsilk background.

interaction_and_states.description: Submit button sends form data to POST /api/arrangements endpoint to create an arrangement record.
Edit button loads existing arrangement into the form for updates.
Delete button triggers DELETE request to remove the selected arrangement.

resource_dependency.mortuary_data_schema: Table with columns: id (UUID), name (string), address (text), phone_number (string), email (string)

function: Display a list of mortuaries with relevant information such as name, address, phone number, and email.
static_description: List view showing multiple mortuary entries with name, address, phone number, and email in peru-styled cards arranged vertically within a cornsilk container.

interaction_and_states.description: User scrolls through the list of mortuary entries without pagination.

resource_dependency.condolence_data_schema: Table with columns: id (UUID), obituary_id (foreign key), message_text (text), author_name (string), created_at (timestamp)

function: Enable users to view and leave condolence messages on others' obituaries.
static_description: Section under each obituary listing previous condolence messages along with a form to submit new ones. Messages appear in a scrollable list with timestamp metadata.

interaction_and_states.description: Submit button posts the condolence message to the associated obituary's condolence endpoint.
User scrolls through previously posted condolence messages.

function: Provide statistical insights about obituaries, user activity, and trends.
static_description: Dashboard displaying charts and numerical summaries for total obituaries, recent activity, and most active contributors inside a peru-styled panel over a cornsilk backdrop.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over chart elements highlights corresponding data points and shows tooltips.
Selecting different time ranges reloads statistics via GET /api/statistics?range=:value.

function: Handle user registration, login, session management, and access control for personal content.
static_description: Authentication forms for login and registration displayed modally or inline. Session status indicator visible across pages once logged in.

interaction_and_states.description: Login/Register buttons send credentials to respective endpoints and set JWT tokens upon successful authentication.
Logout clears local token and redirects to home page.

function: Support uploading, storing, and retrieving multimedia files like images and videos for use in obituaries and memories.
static_description: Media gallery component embedded in obituary detail views, displaying thumbnails or video players with upload controls for authenticated users.

interaction_and_states.description: Upload button opens file picker dialog and submits selected media to the upload endpoint.
Thumbnail click expands image/video in modal viewer.

function: Ensure consistent styling and responsiveness across devices using cornsilk outer layout and peru UI blocks.
static_description: Entire site styled with cornsilk (#FFF8DC) background and peru (#CD853F) colored containers and buttons. Layout adapts to screen size using responsive framework.

function: Enable searching for obituaries and funeral arrangements based on various filters.
static_description: Search bar positioned prominently at top of main pages, accompanied by filter options for refining results.

interaction_and_states.description: Triggers search query submission to GET /api/search endpoint when focused on input.
Apply filters button modifies search parameters before sending request.

database_tables.users: id UUID, username STRING, password_hash STRING, email STRING, created_at TIMESTAMP
database_tables.obituaries: id UUID, user_id UUID, full_name STRING, date_of_birth DATE, date_of_death DATE, biography TEXT, profile_image_url STRING, created_at TIMESTAMP
database_tables.arrangements: id UUID, user_id UUID, event_type STRING, location TEXT, date_time DATETIME, contact_info STRING, additional_details TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP
database_tables.mortuaries: id UUID, name STRING, address TEXT, phone_number STRING, email STRING, created_at TIMESTAMP
database_tables.condolences: id UUID, obituary_id UUID, message_text TEXT, author_name STRING, created_at TIMESTAMP
database_tables.media: id UUID, filename STRING, mime_type STRING, path STRING, uploaded_by UUID, related_to_type ENUM(obituary,arrangement), related_to_id UUID, created_at TIMESTAMP

function: Define database schema structure for persisting all dynamic content including users, obituaries, arrangements, condolences, and media.
static_description: Database tables defined with appropriate relationships and constraints for supporting all core features.
